subject: FOUND IT — admin/ route conflicts with Azure built-in routes
body:
Hey Fulton,

Found the issue in the Azure Functions startup log:

```
The 'Admin_DataHealth' function is in error: The specified route conflicts with one or more built in routes.
The 'Admin_UserActivity' function is in error: The specified route conflicts with one or more built in routes.
```

The route prefix `admin/` conflicts with Azure Functions built-in management routes (`/admin/functions`, `/admin/host/keys`, etc.).

## Fix Required

Change the route in both files from `admin/` to something else:

Admin_UserActivity.js:
```javascript
route: 'ops/user-activity'  // was: 'admin/user-activity'
```

Admin_DataHealth.js:
```javascript
route: 'ops/data-health'  // was: 'admin/data-health'
```

Alternatives: `calops/`, `dashboard/`, `mgmt/`

I'll update the CALOPS frontend to use the new routes once you've made the change.

— Quinn
